name: CGEventMouseSubtype
desc: Constants used with the CGEventField.mouseEventSubtype event field.

items.name: case defaultType
items.desc: Specifies that the event is an ordinary mouse event, and does not contain additional tablet device information.

items.name: case tabletPoint
items.desc: Specifies that the mouse event originated from a tablet device, and that the various kCGTabletEvent field selectors may be used to obtain tablet-specific data from the mouse event.
